products.name: Collection 8 Denim Jacket
products.description: The Denim Jacket is made in the USA from vintaged Japanese denim in a relaxed fit shaped by back pleats. The minimalist trucker style features a shirt collar, antique brass front zipper, side pockets, and antique brass buttons for adjustability. A leather Fear of God label is at the back collar.

products.name: Collection 8 Denim Jacket
products.description: The Denim Jacket is made in the USA from vintaged Japanese denim in a relaxed fit shaped by back pleats. The minimalist trucker style features a shirt collar, antique brass front zipper, side pockets, and antique brass buttons for adjustability. A leather Fear of God label is at the back collar.

products.name: Milano Vee Neck
products.description: The Milano V-Neck Tee is made in Italy from a stretch jersey that combines comfort with formal polish. The V-neck tee is visibly modern, with relaxed proportions and a stylish drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

products.name: Milano Vee Neck
products.description: The Milano V-Neck Tee is made in Italy from a stretch jersey that combines comfort with formal polish. The V-neck tee is visibly modern, with relaxed proportions and a stylish drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

products.name: Embroidered 8 Milano Sweater
products.description: The boucle straight neck sweater is knitted in Italy from a heavily textured virgin wool blend and detailed with a jacquard 8, symbolic of the collection number. The design features a straight neckline with volume in the body and sleeves to create a round silhouette. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

products.name: Embroidered 8 Milano Tee
products.description: The Embroidered 8 Milano Tee is made in Italy from a stretch jersey that combines comfort with formal polish. A heavily textured embroidered  "8" on the front signifies Fear of God's collection number. The fit is relaxed with a stylish drape. A Fear of God leather label is stitched at the back collar.

reviews.title: Awesome Tee
reviews.review: great product, runs a bit on the larger side so if you like your products fitted, I suggest rounding down

reviews.title: Great Quality
reviews.review: True to size, over the top quality! Would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Too Expensive
reviews.review: Item was a bit on the pricier side, not worth it in my opinion.

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.review: Unique V-Neck shape, overall one of my favorite pieces in my closet currently.

reviews.title: LOVE MY TEE
reviews.review: It's nice to find a t-shirt that fits your shape and drapes nicely. This one does just that for me. Fits a bit oversized, quality is supreme.

reviews.title: Great Quality
reviews.review: I have to say the piece is a bit expensive, but overall the quality of the the jacket is very nice, and I plan on keep it in my closet forever. Great purchase if you're looking for longevity.

reviews.title: Too Expensive
reviews.review: For the quality, it was too expensive. I can't justify price for quality. Also runs oversized, size down.

reviews.title: Fits Perfectly!
reviews.review: I would recommend sizing down, I got an XS and it fits just right. Great purchase.

reviews.title: Color not the same as photo!
reviews.review: Not the same color as pictured. Had to return it.

reviews.title: Love the Color!!
reviews.review: I've been wearing this tee non-stop and I have to say it is so cozy, fits perfectly, and I get lots of compliments. So so happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: Average quality, nice shape
reviews.review: The quality is average. I will say the cut is pretty unique and fits my body quite nice. Overall not sure it's worth the price, but if you like a slimmer fit I would recommend sizing down.

reviews.title: No Thanks!
reviews.review: The V shape is too deep and fits awkwardly.

reviews.title: Love love love!!
reviews.review: I am so happy with my purchase. I have been shopping with this brand for quite some time and have to say this is one of my favorite pieces.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review: It's okay. Just a basic V neck. Nothing special, but gets the job done.

reviews.title: SIZE DOWN!!
reviews.review: Product was huge on me. I usually wear a medium and it was like an XL.

reviews.title: Oversized, Great Quality
reviews.review: I love the quality and the lettering detail. Makes the price justifiable and get tons of compliments.

reviews.title: DONT BUY
reviews.review: Terrible shape, terrible color. Do not buy this product.

reviews.title: So Happy!!!
reviews.review: I've been waiting to buy this jacket for some time, and I cant get enough of it. So happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: AWESOME!!! True to Size
reviews.review: Usually the brand runs oversized but this item is very true to size. I would not recommend sizing down.

reviews.title: I Love my purchase
reviews.review: So happy I went for it. It's a difficult brand because they don't have many stores and I like to try it on before I commit but they really nailed it on this shape and the quality is just wonderful.

reviews.title: Great piece, definitely would buy again
reviews.review: I would definitely buy this again, the quality is just to die for. One of my favorite pieces.

reviews.title: I AM SO HAPPY!!!
reviews.review: Fits perfect, the color is fenomenal and the detailing on the number is a really nice touch. Overall so happy with my purchase and wanted to definitely get on here and recommend it. So comfortable.
